headlines.description: Matt Ritchie's last-gasp equaliser earned Newcastle United a point at Bournemouth in a thrilling 2-2 draw at the Vitality Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Last-gasp Ritchie strike saves Newcastle draw

headlines.description: Wes Morgan's 90th-minute header earned 10-man Leicester City a 2-1 victory over relegation-threatened Burnley at Turf Moor in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Morgan earns 10-man Leicester win at Burnley

events.name: Huddersfield Town at West Ham United

headlines.description: Substitute striker Javier Hernandez scored a late brace including a stoppage-time winner to help West Ham United beat Huddersfield Town 4-3.
headlines.shortLinkText: 'Chicharito' brace as West Ham down Huddersfield
